mean_cn: v. （使）小跑，（使）快步走，骑马小跑，疾走；  n. 小跑，骑马，疾走
mean_en: (of a horse or its rider) to move forward at a speed that is faster than a walk and slower than a canter; to ride a horse in this way; (of a person or an animal) to run or walk fast, taking short quick steps; to walk or go somewhere
sentence: The horse is trotting on the grassland.
